Standard Risk Matrix (1-5): Very Minor: Very minor effect, noticed by the discriminating customers. The failure will have little perceptible effect on the discriminating customers.
Very Low: Very low effect, noticed by most customers. The failure will have some small perceptible effect on most customers.
Moderate: Primary product function is operational, but secondary functions are inoperable. Customer is moderately dissatisfied.
Very High: Primary product function is nonoperational but safe. Customer is very dissatisfied.
Hazard with no warning: Failure mode affects safe product operation and/or involves nonconformance with government regulation without warning.
column3: Very High: Failure is almost inevitable (> 1 in 2)
